thread.title: Bitcoin Accepted: Advertising Platform

title: Bitcoin Accepted: Advertising Platform
text: Questions Business Summary Buy actual ad technology business for $500,000 which comes with multiple websites, domains, technology, well known brand name and more. Bitcoin accepted as well as other payment options. Buyer pays fees. Other options: Own and Sell your own software ad platforms. Every website, app, mobile, video uses advertising and EVERY owner needs these products to make money. $250,000 one time fee and you have an instant business with products and technology Then sell and franchise to customers worldwide under your own company umbrella. Make millions! Advertising Platforms for Display, Video, Apps, Mobile Ad Network
